plot outline: A headache tale, the story begins with Dr Kamath who is having a problem. The don Silent Siddhu is in love with Kamath's sister Charmi and wants to marry her. But Kamath doesn't know that and starts giving tips to the don on wooing the girl. On the other hand, Charmi is in love with Prem and the story takes a turn when Kamath realizes that Siddhu is after his sister. Meanwhile, Prem decides to take the challenge and uses his mind to put Siddhu in prison. However, the don arrives at all places. Whether the love story of Prem-Charmi is successful or not forms the rest of the story.
title: Dhan Dhana Dhan
plot: A headache tale, the story begins with Dr Kamath who is having a problem. The don Silent Siddhu is in love with Kamath's sister Charmi and wants to marry her. Meanwhile, Prem decides to take the challenge and uses his mind to put Siddhu in prison. However, the don arrives at all places. Whether the love story of Prem-Charmi is successful or not forms the rest of the story.
